SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.fxml_controllers.window

Class LeftTopbarController

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
net.cnoga.paint.core.fxml_controllers.window.LeftTopbarController
public class LeftTopbarController extends EventBusPublisher
Controller for the left top bar, which contains the File/Edit/View/Image menus.

Acts as the bridge between left_topbar.fxml and the backend services. Each menu item is wired via fx:id and onAction to this controller, which then posts the corresponding request to the EventBus.

Typical Flow:
  1. User selects a menu item (e.g., "Open File").
  2. The corresponding handler posts an event such as FileOpenRequest.
  3. Subscribed services react to the event and perform the actual work.
Responsibilities:
  • Listen for menu item actions.
  • Post appropriate file- and app-related events.
